Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: The camera is marvelous and easy to use. With this price i paid, all the functions of this camera are awesome such as wifi, panorama, smart auto ... I love this product, you can also see other camera with the same qualities as wellhttp://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00B5HE2MO/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B00B5HE2MO&linkCode;=as2&tag;=dmtungrau-20

ProductInfo.Features:
16.2MP CCD Image Sensor 3.0" 230k-Dot LCD
25-125mm f/2.5 5x Optical Zoom Lens Capture HD 720/30p Video
ISO 100 to 12800 Wi-Fi Direct, Email
2D Panorama, Smart Auto, Smart Movie Face, Blink and Smile Detection
Direct LINK, Mobile Link, Remote VF microSD/microSDHC Memory Card Slot
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST150F Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera (Pink)
